title: Can't buy RP
body:
Just got a Visa gift card and I've been trying to purchase some RP, but it kept saying the card was being declined by something (I forgot). Now after too many failed attempts I can't use it for another 24 hrs to purchase RP, any idea how to fix this?

P.S. - Maybe changing my time had something to do with it, only way I could get into the client

replies.body: Most likely there was something that was entered in incorrectly, or you might have been using the wrong entry field. At this point, you'll have to wait the full 24 hours before trying to make any other purchases, but once that time period is up you can reach out to our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need any help!
